text:
The Wait Is Over! PC - Nick Give A Sneak Peek Into Their Big Day & The Pics Are Phenomenal
The Wait Is Over! PC - Nick Give A Sneak Peek Into Their Big Day & The Pics Are Phenomenal
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have finally tied the knot in Jodhpur today. The couple was surrounded by their loved ones as they exchanged vows. The ceremony, which was held in Jodhpur's Umaid Bhawan Palace, was officiated by Nick's father Paul Kevin Sr.
As soon as their wedding ceremony ended, the sky lit up with 'spectacular fireworks'.
#WATCH: Fireworks at Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, after Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas tied the knot as per Christian rituals. pic.twitter.com/XpzYtGZG2G — ANI (@ANI) December 1, 2018
PC and Nick took to their social media accounts to share the first pictures and they are dreamy and beautiful.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
PC wrote a beautiful note with the pictures. She wrote,
"One of the most special things that our relationship has given us is a merging of families who love and respect each other’s faiths and cultures. And so planning our wedding with an amalgamation of both was so so amazing. "
Congratulations, Mr. and Mrs. Jonas! Here's to new beginnings!
title: The Wait Is Over! PC - Nick Give A Sneak Peek Into Their Big Day & The Pics Are Phenomenal
description: The Royal Wedding Celebrations: Pictures Of PC And Nick's Wedding Festivities Are Out!The Royal Wedding Celebrations: Pictures Of PC And Nick's Wedding Festivities Are Out!The Royal Wedding Celebrations: Pictures Of PC And Nick's Wedding Festivities Are Out!
